name: Vervoerregio Amsterdam
membership: Lid van het EMTA - European Metropolitan Transport Authorities.
goal: Formal collaboration of 15 municipalities. Main tasks include clientship of public transport concessions in and around the Amsterdam region, and the improvement of regional accessibility through mobility projects and grants for said projects.
interests: Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, Institutional affairs, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: TEN-T corridors; Innovation and research on mobility in general; International trains; Zero emission public transport and load infrastructure, logistics, standards etc. to achieve a better air quality; Smart mobility, in particular data and privacy; Mobility as a Service (MaaS); Cycling; Road safety; Grants
